LABEL_ASSIGNMENT.FAILED: Couldn't assign label. Please try again.

EMAIL_TRANSCRIPT.TITLE: Send conversation transcript
EMAIL_TRANSCRIPT.DESC: Send a copy of the conversation transcript to a specified email address.
EMAIL_TRANSCRIPT.SEND_EMAIL_SUCCESS: The chat transcript was sent successfully.
EMAIL_TRANSCRIPT.SEND_EMAIL_ERROR: There was an error. Please try again.

FORM.SEND_TO_AGENT: Send transcript to the assigned agent
FORM.SEND_TO_OTHER_EMAIL_ADDRESS: Send transcript to another email address

EMAIL.ERROR: Please enter a valid email address.

ONBOARDING.TITLE: Hey ðŸ‘‹, Welcome to %{installationName}!
ONBOARDING.DESCRIPTION: We're here to help you make the most out of your experience. To get started, given below is a list of things you can do.

CHATWOOT_TUTORIALS.TITLE: Learn the basics: Chatwoot tutorials and glossary
CHATWOOT_TUTORIALS.DESCRIPTION: Learn the terminology used in Chatwoot with the glossary. Go through the Chatwoot 101 tutorials to setup and learn how to utilize Chatwoot and practice effective customer communication.

PROFILE_SETTINGS.TITLE: Customize your personal profile
PROFILE_SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: Update your Agent profile, set your notifcation preferences, reset your password, and more.

INBOXES.TITLE: Connect inboxes
INBOXES.DESCRIPTION: Connect with your customers through various channels. It can be a website live-chat, your Facebook or Twitter page or even your WhatsApp number.
INBOXES.NEW_LINK: Click here to create an inbox

TEAM_MEMBERS.TITLE: Invite your team members
TEAM_MEMBERS.DESCRIPTION: Invite your teammates to join you in the conversations with customers. You can send them email invitations.
TEAM_MEMBERS.NEW_LINK: Click here to invite a team member
